justification: Proposal centers on stabilizing Team A and ignores Team B’s conservative, floor-oriented preferences. It sends volatile assets (Thompson, Campbell) to a manager who avoids boom/bust, with no nod to B’s preference for possession WRs or pocket passers. Trade is feasible but misaligned with A’s needs (giving up a Tier 3 RB) and lacks evidence beyond playoff schedules. Rationale is brief and one-sided.
